file_content.text: You saved this settlement. I'll make sure no one forgets that.
Glad we did this, but we need to wipe that smug grin off Watcher One's face. Shall we?
Doctor Godera = still prisoner // T7 + Jedi = to the rescue?
We'll be alright now. I'm sure you've got important business elsewhere.
That Sith and her beasts... if you hadn't been here, they'd have torn us to pieces.
Our settlement is new. We have fresh supplies. Please take some.
Your safety is all the reward I need.
Not necessary.
My parents told me stories of the Jedi when I was a boy. Now I know they're true.
The Sith will come again. Don't be here when they do.
Take your supplies and go.
We knew life on Taris would be hard, but we had no idea....
I'm sure I'll find a use for them.
How generous.
One thing is certain... building up our settlement's defenses just became the top priority.
Welcome, Master Jedi. How did our humble settlement earn this honor?
Do you need food or water? Anything we have is yours.
A Sith wants you all dead. I'm here to defend you.
You're in danger.
Run for your lives. Move!
Evacuate!
Please, you're frightening people. I don't understand.
Did you hear my Master? Get going!
We're not trying to cause a panic, Kira.
Calm down, Padawan.
Sorry. Thought they needed encouragement.
Trust us, you don't want to be here.
No time to explain.
Understatement of the millennium.
Go, before we both lose our patience.
Obey her.
If you want to live, do as we say.
I... I'll round up everyone I can, but I need time.
Too late. Time's up.
We can discuss all that after I kill the Sith coming to attack you.
Tempting.
Sith? But why us? We haven't done anything.
Since when do Sith need a reason to kill people?
This is horrible. We're not prepared for this.
Then you should not have come back to a world that is not yours.
Taris belongs to the Sith Empire--now and forever. Even my beasts understand that.
I can sense the fear in your animals.
Those beasts are terrified.
They're only afraid of me. You... just make them hungry.
There is no settlement to destroy.
[Force Persuade] Walk away.
There's... there's no settlement here. Nothing to destroy.
You've wasted your time.
This was a waste of time!
You're leaving Taris immediately.
There's no reason to even be here. Come, my pets....
You're amazing. You saved us without ever drawing your weapon.
I can't believe that worked as well as it did.
The outcome surprised even me.
Question is, how long will she be confused?
Sith = not easily confused for long
The Force saved us. I was merely a conduit for its power.
You give me too much credit.
Don't know how you stay so humble, but... nice work.
Jedi = better than she thinks // Jedi = greatest there is!
Jedi = better than he thinks // Jedi = greatest there is!
I knew Sith were weak-minded, but that was ridiculous.
That Sith was an idiot.
We'll set up ray shields in case that Sith returns. She won't get back in here.
I want you to have this. Been with my family for generations. Go on, take it--I insist.
I'll kill all of you.
When my pets are done feasting on you, I'll keep your bones.
Before you die, satisfy my curiosity. My mission was secret. How did you know about it?
You can't trust your own people. That's why the Empire will fall.
You were betrayed from inside.
I'm not here to satisfy you.
None of your business.
But you will. One way or another.
One of your top spies warned me you were coming.
Watcher One.
I'll inform Darth Angral of this security breach--but first things first.
My pets are ready to play. Are you?
We keep our supplies in the cargo pods over there. Take anything you like.
You presume too much.
